title: dEvAya haviSE
sahitya:
dEvAya haviSE dhIrAya namastE


anupallavi

  bhavabhaya haraNAya pAvana sucaritAya 
AvaraNa rahitAya ambikA ramaNAya


caraNam    vEda svarUpAya vrSabhArUDhAya nAda rasa nilayA navanIta hrdayAya
 Adi dEvAya shrI harikEsha rUpAya mOdakara caritAya mukti sukha bharitAya
